p: 3) Rocco M, Montini L, Alessandri E, Venditti M, Laderchi A, De Pascale G, Raponi G, Vitale M, Pietropaoli P, Antonelli M: Risk factors for acute kidney injury in critically ill patients receiving high intravenous doses of colistin methanesulfonate and/or other nephrotoxic antibiotics: a retrospective cohort study. Critical care (London, England) 2013, 17(4):R174.
